runInfo.title: Runinfo
runInfo.description: The information regarding the formulation and the internal reference, which is common for all data generated in this run of the method.

conductivity.title: Conductivity
conductivity.description: The output generated for the conductivity data.

name.title: Name
name.description: A human readable name of the chemical.

smiles.title: Smiles
smiles.description: A SMILES string representing the chemical.

InChIKey.title: Inchikey
InChIKey.description: The hashed standard International Chemical Identifier of the chemical to ensure machine-readability.

FractionType.title: FractionType
FractionType.description: Fraction types used to specify formulations

name.title: Name
name.description: A human readable name of the formulation.

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: A unique identifier assigned to this formulation in this run.

chemicals.title: Chemicals
chemicals.description: A dictionary of the chemicals included in the formulation. InChIKeys as keys and corresponding Chemical objects as values.

chemicalComposition.title: Chemicalcomposition
chemicalComposition.description: A dictionary with the InChIKey as the key and the respective unitless fraction of the chemical in the total of the mixture as a value.

fractionType.description: A value of an enumeration defining, what kind of a fraction is given in the formulation. This can be for example molar fractions, volume fractions, mass fractions,.... At the moment only molar fractions are supported.

FormulationInfo.title: FormulationInfo
FormulationInfo.description:
Additional information about a formulation, which is relevant for documentation
purposes

preparationDate.title: Preparationdate
preparationDate.description: The date when the formulation was prepared. For commercial formulations, the manufacturing date may be used.

batch.title: Batch
batch.description: A batch number for the formulation, if it is available.

ChemicalInfo.title: ChemicalInfo
ChemicalInfo.description:
Additional information about a chemical, which is relevant for documentation
purposes

molarMass.title: Molarmass
molarMass.description: The molar mass of the chemical and the correcponding uncertainty. This may be a measured quantity or a literature value. It is needed to convert between volumetric and molar ratios and this field serves to report the used value.

density.title: Density
density.description: The density of the chemical and the correcponding uncertainty. This may be a measured quantity or a literature value. It is needed to convert between volumetric and molar ratios and this field serves to report the used value.

batch.title: Batch
batch.description: A batch number for the chemical used, if it is available.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of the chemical, if it is available.

manufacturingDate.title: Manufacturingdate
manufacturingDate.description: The date when the chemical was manufactured.

formulation.title: Formulation
formulation.description: This is a formulation defining the Chemicals contained in thesample and their fraction in the total mixture.

internalReference.title: Internalreference
internalReference.description: This field is an internal ID identifying this run of the method. In experimental setups, this may reference to an ID of the sample.

formulationInfo.title: Formulationinfo
formulationInfo.description: This is the metadata concerning the formulation relevant for documentation.

chemicalsInfo.title: Chemicalsinfo
chemicalsInfo.description: This is a dictionary of metadata of the chemicals relevant for documentation. The keys are InChIKeys of the chemicals contained in the formulation and the values are ChemicalInfo objects.

success.title: Success
success.description: This reports, if the method finished successfully.

rating.title: Rating
rating.description: This field serves to rate the quality of the result from the tenant side. It shall serve as a support for the recieving party upon evaluating the trustworthiness of the result. It shall range from 0 (lowest) to 5 (highest).

ConductivityOutput.title: ConductivityOutput
ConductivityOutput.description:
Results returned from the following quantities:
'conductivity' - 'twoElectrodeMeasuringCell'
'conductivity' - 'molecularDynamicsSimulation'

values.title: Values
values.description: The values determined for the conductivity given in S/m.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: This is the actual temperature of the measuring cell or used in a simulation. It shall be given in the unit kelvin.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: This field provides information regarding the reliability of the reported data. E.g. the success of the method for this quantity and the rating of the data. This is for this specific quantity, because a single method could fail individually for different quantities.
